Question: align-content
Answer: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

Question: align-items
Answer: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container

Question: align-self
Answer: Specifies the alignment for selected items inside a flexible container

Question: flex
Answer: Specifies the length of the item, relative to the rest

Question: flex-basis
Answer: Specifies the initial length of a flexible item

Question: flex-direction
Answer: Specifies the direction of the flexible items

Question: flex-flow
Answer: A shorthand property for the flex-direction and the flex-wrap properties

Question: flex-grow
Answer: Specifies how much the item will grow relative to the rest

Question: flex-shrink
Answer: Specifies how the item will shrink relative to the rest

Question: flex-wrap
Answer: Specifies whether the flexible items should wrap or not

Question: justify-content
Answer: Specifies the alignment between the items inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space

Question: order
Answer: Sets the order of the flexible item, relative to the rest
